title: How FiveThirtyEight Calculates Pollster Ratings FiveThirtyEight » Features | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: See FiveThirtyEight’s pollster ratings. Pollster ratings were one of the founding features of FiveThirtyEight. I was rating pollsters before I was building election models. I was eagerly updating the ratings after every major batch of election results. I rated pollsters while walking two miles uphill … barefoot … in the snow. And then I got […]
